lead_paragraph: The unidentified body was transported to the Orange County morgue, where an autopsy will be performed, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Body Found in Hudson River, Near Where Kayak Capsized
headline.main: Body Found in Hudson River Near Where Kayaker Disappeared

snippet: The unidentified body was transported to the Orange County morgue, where an autopsy will be performed, the police said.
abstract: New York State Police troopers discover body in Hudson River near where kayaker Vincent Viafore disappeared in April; identity of body has not been confirmed; Viafore's fiancee Angelika Graswald has been charged with murdering him.
